Proposal data

Source: R/fokus.gen.R
proposals.Rd

A tibble containing basic referendum proposal data of all FOKUS questionnaires.

proposals

Format

A tibble.

See also

Other questionnaire and survey functions and datasets: elections, export_easyvote_municipalities(), export_print_recipients(), export_q_all(), export_qr_codes(), export_q(), qx

Examples

fokus::proposals
#> # A tibble: 19 × 7
#>    ballot_date lvl      canton    nr type    name.de.short    name.de.long
